result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ga: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.orig: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.html: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé an-aisteaċ bualaḋ le m'aṫair don ċéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.

result.html: Tá cuma aisteach airIt looks strange.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma aisteaċ airIt looks strange.

result.ga: Tá cuma aisteach ar an chlúdach

result.html: Tá cuma aisteach ar an chlúdachThe cover looks strange.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma aisteaċ ar an ċlúdaċThe cover looks strange.

result.eng: Gaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ga: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.orig: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.html: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ponchtml: Tá foirgniṁ de ċuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann

result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
